DOC.brief_summary: Occupation stress can be the risk factors of early embryonic death
DOC.brief_title: A Cohort Study for Occupational Stress Induced Early Embryonic Death
DOC.criteria: 1. Pregnant women and their spouses in the gynecology clinic patients and wish to create the cards in the hospital; 2. the gestational age is less than 14 weeks; 3. pregnant women and their spouses have jobs before treatment. Do not sign the informed consent.
